title: World Skate Asia
text:
World Skate Asia formerly known as Confederation of Asia Roller Sports (CARS) is the main <a href="roller%20skating">roller skating</a> organization of Asia. World Skate Asia is part of the <a href="World%20Skate">World Skate</a>. Varieties of skating governed by the WS include:
One of the most important events organized by CARS is the "<a href="Roller%20Hockey%20Asia%20Cup">Roller Hockey Asia Cup</a>".
Asian Roller Sports Championship.
Asian Roller Sports Championship is one of the biggest event in Asian Region For Roller Sport, it started in 1985, it is held every 2 years. The Confederation of Asia Roller Sports (CARS) is the main <a href="roller%20skating">roller skating</a> organization of Asia. The CARS is part of the <a href="International%20Roller%20Sports%20Federation">International Roller Sports Federation</a>, or FIRS. Varieties of skating governed by the CARS include:
One of the most important events organized by CARS is the <a href="Roller%20Hockey%20Asia%20Cup">Roller Hockey Asia Cup</a> and <a href="Inline%20Hockey%20Asia%20Cup">Inline Hockey Asia Cup</a>.
Championships.
